item.description:
Hello Everyone,

Gale Barton owner of SweetFerns has committed to our members to have a Holiday Wreath workshop. It will be held at the Larches Inn on November 15th from 1:00 to 3:30. This will be a limited class of 15 members.

HOLIDAY/WINTER WREATH
Supplies for you to bring: cool/hot melt mini glue gun, glue sticks (Can be found at local craft stores inexpensively or at Wal Mart). Wire cutters.
All other supplies will be provided to create a 12" grapevine wreath. We will be using silk and dried winter greens, berries, dried quince as well as other embellishments to design the wreath.
Cost of the class is $35.00. Prepaid by Nov.1 to Sweetferns.
Bring your favorite sweet, along with the recipe to swap with other class members.
We will have an opportunity at the end of the class to share organic teas, everyone's sweet treats and wonderful conversation.

Please call the Larches Inn 508-866-9228 to register for this work shop.
item.name: LARCHES INN HOLIDAY WREATH WORKSHOP
